title: Real Madrid tie halted over Vinicius racism allegation
summary_full: Real Madrid's Champions League knockout phase play-off tie at Benfica is halted for 10 minutes after Vinicius Junior reports alleged racist abuse.
summary_public: Real Madrid's Champions League knockout phase play-off tie at Benfica is halted for 10 minutes after Vinicius Junior reports alleged racist abuse.

ES.label: negative
ES.evidence: Real Madrid tie halted over Vinicius racism allegation
